pain.text: I'm head of ops at a 60-person SaaS company. Our client success team manually compiles reports from 6 different tools every week. It's 20 hours per person. Leadership won't approve more headcount but won't invest in automation either. How do I make the business case?

outreach.hook: Hi there — 30+ hours on client reports is brutal. We automated a similar workflow for an agency, cut it to 2 hours/week. Happy to build you a free proof-of-concept?
